item.title: 'Order in the hall': Dozens walk out as Netanyahu begins speech at UN
item.description: Dozens of people filed out of the room in protest at the United Nations General Assembly in New York.

item.title: Turkey abandons bid to force doner kebab rules on Europe
item.description: The case had alarmed Germany's kebab industry in particular, who make doners very differently.

item.title: Namibians warned against holding parties at cemeteries after 'disgraceful' event
item.description: One resident said the cemetery in the capital had been left littered with discarded bottles and cans.

item.title: Two Dutch teenagers arrested in spying case linked to Russia
item.description: The pair were allegedly recruited by pro-Russian hackers and used a "wi-fi sniffer" on the Europol headquarters.

item.title: Mass arrests for sextortion and romance scams in sting operation across Africa
item.description: Some 260 suspects were arrested in the operation across 14 African countries, says Interpol.
